item.description:
Any-one interested in touch footy this summer on a Thursday evening followed by a brew or two at the Banshee pub (they even supply aussie style sandwich quarters & other tidbits for the touch players!).  It starts at 6.30pm and latecomers are welcome too...

You dont have to commit for every week - 2+ weeks makes it worth your while... come 1 week and have a chat/drink even!  Bring a mate if you like too (don't have to be Aussie!)

It starts June 2nd (yeah short notice - I've been v-busy!!) It will cost us $20ea if we can get at least 10 (and you get a T-shirt @ that price too...)  If we get a bunch we can put 2 teams in or just hook up with other teams.

It is mixed and very very informal (you can even come late since there are at least 2 short games each every week) so if you understand rugby league and like to have some fun - come on along.

It is T accessible from the JFK - UMASS T stop (< 1/2 km)... so you can drink & ride...

Please RSVP if you are interested, even on a casual basis - we even have a few Kiwi's that come along & don't mind being associated with us.

All the best - summer is coming, in spite of the current weather.

Any questions, give me a buzz 617-842-8076

All the best, Brian

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Touch footy - cancelled for tonight 6/23 due to weather!
